job.title: Machine Learning Engineer / $45 per hour DOE
job.description: We have a client who is looking to bring on a Machine Learning Engineer to join their team This company focuses on people and how they navigate their everyday lives from things like major purchases like buying a house life changing events like going to college or starting a new business They focus on making sure that the data their clientsconsumers have before during and after making these big decisions is delivered effectively and set them up for successbrbrstronguUpon Joining The Team You Would BebrustrongulliWorking in close collaboration with data science and engineering teamsliliAnalyzing structured and unstructured data sources to determine the key business questions and hypotheses that can be explored with the data setsliliEvaluating approaches and algorithms based on available data and research objectivesliliDeveloping experimental ML Models to solve complex data mining problemsbrliulstronguRequired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongulli3 years of experienceliliDegree in Computer Science or relatedliliPythonliliSnowflakeliliSQLliliAWS Sagemaker brliulstronguDesired Skills amp ExperiencebrustrongulliIndependent ThinkingliliMust have an understanding of US Retail and Online MarketsbrliulWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrTech Breakdownbrulli90 Machine Learning lili10 Engineering brliulDaily Responsibilitiesbrulli100 Hands OnbrliulThe OfferbrulliCompetitive Salary Up to 45hour DOElili7 month contracttohirebrliulstronguYou Will Receive The Following BenefitsbrustrongulliMedical Insurance amp Health Savings Account HSAlili401kliliPaid Sick Time LeaveliliPretax Commuter BenefitbrliulApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrstrongPosted Bystrong Treasure Kimp
